metadata.feature_description: Basic UI structure and navigation for URL management module

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO in Persona Bar
steps.expected: URL Management module loads and displays
steps.actual: URL Management module loaded successfully under SEO section with General Settings, Extension URL Providers, Expressions, and Test URL tabs visible

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to Extension URL Providers Tab

steps.action: Click on EXTENSION URL PROVIDERS tab
steps.expected: Extension URL Providers tab content displays
steps.actual: Extension URL Providers tab loaded successfully showing two providers: Evoq Content Item Url Extension Provider and Evoq Structured Content Visualizer Url Extension Provider, both enabled

steps.expected: Expressions tab content displays with regular expression settings
steps.actual: Expressions tab loaded successfully showing Regular Expressions section with fields for Ignore URL, Do Not Rewrite URL, Site URLs Only, Do Not Redirect URL, and other regex pattern configurations

steps.expected: Test URL tab content displays with URL testing tools
steps.actual: Test URL tab loaded successfully showing two sections: Test a Page URL (with Page to Test dropdown, Query String, Custom Page Name fields) and Test URL Rewriting (with URL to Test input and result fields)

steps.action: Click on Sitemap Settings main tab
steps.actual: Sitemap Settings tab loaded successfully showing General Sitemap Settings (Sitemap URL, cache settings, priority settings), Sitemap Providers list, and Site Submission section

observations: The URL Management module is located under Settings > SEO, not directly under Site Behavior as suggested in the feature documentation

The urlmanagement.js and urlmanagement.html source files contain placeholder content ('Hello World, This is Url Management' and alert() calls), but the actual UI uses a more sophisticated React-based implementation from the Persona Bar framework
The EXPRESSIONS tab has a blue globe icon indicator next to it in the tab bar
